name: Color War Mortal Skies: Journey of Ultimate Force Hope! Air Combat Shooter
name_original: Color War Mortal Skies: Journey of Ultimate Force Hope! Air Combat Shooter
description:
Welcome to this amazing world! Chorrus Games is proud to present today a game like none you've seen before. Are you looking for a game to relax and have a great time? You are in the right place. Just sit comfortable and grab your iOS device: you'll have the chance now to experience this amazing game for FREE!


Don’t hesitate: Download NOW Color Wars Mania - Have Fun! for FREE!!!
In this addicting game you'll have the chance to experience a real-time strategy games dynamic: flood bigger territory and challenge the invading army with veteran units, complete your missions, explode, attack and defend, make colorful blasts of paint winning epic battles in this free war games champion. Combining colors and free war games, Color Wars Mania is one of the best arcade war game you can find in the market: great game for kids and for adults, it will give you hours and hours of fun and excitement!


Outscore your opponents and Win the battle against the servants of the darkness: use the power of living colors and win the final battle of this Crazy Float Carnival!


Features:
- Great HD graphics
- Interactive Interface
- Intuitive and easy to Play
- Colorful and Challenging!


We are waiting just for you to join us in the most amazing and colorful battle of 2016! So, don’t wait any longer: Download NOW Color Wars Mania - Have Fun! for FREE!!!
